title: Drawing, "Socrates, Pericles, Alcibiades, Aspasia in Discussion", 1810–25
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over traces of graphite on light brown laid paper
markings: Watermark: upper-right part of lily showing as crest.
inscribed: Inscribed: conversazione di socrate Aspasia Pericle e alcibiade
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Aspasia shown in profile seated in front of table with face turned backwards at three men who sit or stand behind table. Socrates speaks and points at place in paper scroll lying upon table.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Socrates, Pericles, Alcibiades, Aspasia in Discussion", 1810–25.
1810–25. Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over traces of graphite on light brown laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-3341.
